reviewDescription: I lovee it , I can't explain how amazing it looks and even how amazing features it has the colour and the length it amazing.

Product is nice and value for money. Battery life can be improved when we use watch with phone connect via bluetooth. Currently battery died in 2.5 days if connected all day else battery performance is nice for 6-8days.
Excellent watch and worth the money paid for it

Please read my review before buying.I am a first time smartwatch user, so my review depends on impressions not on experience. It's truly smart, this watch's smartness determined it by some extra features like QR code tray, if you are a shop keeper this feature really helps to receive payment from customer, just raise your hand towards the customers. Also you can customise your watch face by your Phone gallery pictures, plus it's give you symbolic GPS navigation, Live sports update. And also have generic smartwatch features. But there is also some technical glitches like 5G network weakness sometimes, sometimes blutooth connection problem, BOAT CREST APP draining phone's battery fast. Also have charging glitch it's hard to charge after 97% and takes time to starting charge. You can't set your own song as ringtone, and there is no notification tone it's only vibrate when notify, don't recieving notification from some must have apps like outlook, phonepay, also sometimes missing notification and score update, no weather update, no double tap screen wake up, hopefully wating for update, Although according its price these minor problems are compromisable.THE QUALITY SCORE CARD GIVEN BELOW ACCORDING MY OBSERVATION.#Calling:7/10#Notification:4/10#LOOKS: 8/10#BUILD QUALITY:8/10#SCREEN BRIGHTNESS:9/10#SPEAKER:5/10#MICROPHONE:7/10#FEATURES:10/10#CONNECTIVITY:7/10#BATTERY BACKUP:6/10 (2-3 Days)#CHARGING TIME:8/10 (75 min)If you are a first time smartwatch user and want to try this type of gadget with out investing huge amount,just go for it. It will not disappoint you.

     In 1099 this is best bcz of the brand and its suite for who have bigger hands. Looks good comfort also good .fit. instead of UPI you will buy this watch your debit card of any bank for discount rupees 200 I'm already did this,I bought this watch 899 rupees.

Digital watch with useful features and health monitoring suite.  Customised watch face, breathing exercise and bt calling are  also some special feature. However some software improvement is required as alarm does not make sound only vibration.

Review after more than 6 months of usage.Firmware/software is super buggy. I don't think any serious break fix or enhancements are happening.Watch Gets restarted very often, sometimes the restart loop never ends until the battery runs out.Most of the time the activity that is started will close out by it's own and you will loose track of it. Even the stop watch and timer functions are getting closed without any notice.The navigation is pretty useless and i never bothered to use it after trying it a couple of times in the initial days.Nothing so bad or great about battery life, BT calling, vital measurements or the overall interphase including display and touch.The chain strap starts getting kind of rust formation after a week of usage. ( I sweat a lot. )I got it on sale for 1k, however still thinks that I should have gone for some other options.Using it just because i bought it.Not recommended for a fresh buy.

reviewTitle: Everything is very good except the battery life... Ignoring the battery problem I love it
reviewDescription: Drawbacks•Let's know this first, which is not much...1st of all the delivery was very late, almost after 1 month of ordering this product...but I guess that may be due to the great sale offer that was going on at that time...•And second and most and the only problem with this watch is the battery life ... As mentioned in the description it will go on for 7 days, that's right and continue for more days actually but if only you use it to see the time and don't use any apps or features much...otherwise it'll hardly live for 1.5/2 days at the very beginning...BenefitsNow the main parts...•1st of all though the delivery was late, it was good and well protected...•Secondly, the featuresThis boat xtend smartwatch is really good and handy if you are a tech-savvy person... You have to download the boat wave app and connect the device through it and not through Bluetooth, you can but it's better with the app...you can set and personalize everything through this app...~Health data is almost accurate and keeps track of your well-being very well... It includes step counts from calorie burn to stress level to BP, oxygen level to even the menstruation cycle ... It gives weekly health report... breath training feature is also available if you need it...~14 kinds of sports activities including cycling, swimming, hiking, rowing, cricket etc are available there...~It has found my phone, flashlight, weather forecast, music features for phone, stopwatch, timer, alarm, and sleeping time features as well, and pretty good in using them all...it takes 1 or 2 seconds of processing time...~There are 2 types of wake-up gestures, hand free and pressing the side knob...~And if you activate Amazon Alexa then you will get to do more with this watch, like calculating easy math problems, translating your words in different languages, finding quotes, and many more...just explore and it will amaze you for sure...~also there are too many watch faces and you can also use pictures to your liking...
Nice 👍🏻
Try to improve your battery capacity within this. Extend battery lifetime pending all things were good within this price. Improve battery durability
Its definitely a good value for money buy. However, I faced battery draining issues.
